description: This file defines a React functional component named PortfolioDetail, which displays detailed information about a specific investment portfolio, including allocation, performance, assets, and transactions. It imports various components and hooks to fetch data from an API and render the UI accordingly.

methods.name: formatCurrency(value, currency = 'USD')
methods.description: Formats a number into a currency string, defaulting to USD. Uses Intl.NumberFormat and falls back to a manual formatting if Intl is not supported.

methods.name: PortfolioDetail()
methods.description: A React functional component that displays detailed information about a portfolio, including name, change percentage, total value, allocation chart, performance chart, assets table, and transactions table. It manages loading, error, and data states, and fetches data from an API using useEffect hook.
